          <title>
            <string language="en">Friction on rough surfaces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion auf rauhen Oberflächen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Frottement sur les surfaces approximatives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fricção em superfícies ásperas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrito sulle superfici ruvide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τριβή στις τραχιές επιφάνειες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fricción en superficies ásperas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the roughness of two surfaces in contact and are made to stick together by friction.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">irregularities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Push</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rough surface</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Rauheit von zwei 
Oberflächen im Kontakt und wird gebildet, um zusammen zu haften durch
Friktion.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la rugosité de deux 
surfaces en contact et est faite pour coller ensemble par frottement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a aspereza de duas 
superfícies no contato e é feita para furar junto pela fricção.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la rugosità di due 
superfici in contatto ed è fatta per attaccare insieme da attrito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την τραχύτητα δύο 
επιφανειών σε επαφή και γίνεται στο ραβδί μαζί από την τριβή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la aspereza de dos 
superficies en contacto y es hecha para pegarse junta por la 
fricción.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
